page.title: 09Sport in our Area
page.content: Both Goring's recreation grounds have swings and slides.The other recreation is the Bourdillion.The sheepcote field is by far the biggest and it has tennis courts but no swings etc.Goring has sports clubs as well.Football Tennis, Sailing and cricket.The cricket mens side has been going for about 109 years.They train on Mondays and they play there matches on Saturdays and Sundays.The boys train on Saturday's. The Tennis club for juniers train three days a week at the sheepcote field And the men and women and children play tounerments. The Goring Robins Football sides are 8 to 15 years. The Goring have an a and b mens side. The Robins have been going for ten years. The Rowing club has been going for almost 50 years. You can start at any age.
